div.p: Predicted relationship of three parameters of the dynamic occupancy model with covariates (vegetation cover, elevation and longitude) for the range dynamics of the European goldfinch ( Carduelis carduelis) in western Maghreb from 1990–1991 to 2015–2016. ( a) Predicted response of occupancy probability in 1990–1991. ( b) Extinction probability. ( c) Detection probability in 1990–1991. ( d) Detection probability in 2015–2016. The gradient of colour from grey to red corresponds to a range of low to high probability. Values of observed covariates at 237 sample plots are presented as circles.
